name: Agriculture Express
description:
Manage carriages of crops, bringing your harvest to the towns up ahead. Can you make enough cash to buy that luxury retirement carriage?

Use the carriage buttons to the left/right to navigate the train. mouse wheel or clicking the carriage also work.

A chill farming management game, made for Ludum Dare 52. Carriages are filled with crops, which grow and eventually yield produce. Towns will buy produce. Watch your cash, you need to ensure you have enough to pay for fuel to keep going!
